Text:
The most hilarious absurd sick comedy including Top Secret! (1984) & The Onion Movie (2008)
I didn't laugh at any other film as much as at these three ;-) they make you pee in the pants, lol.
Hi. The sound doesnt work for me, either in VLC or Win MediaPlayer. If i drag the ac3 file into VLC i get the sound but no picture. What to do?

Audio Tracks ( all demuxed, skip from download the ones you don't want )
Use MPC   http://cccp-project.net/ to be able to automatically recognize & play
the external Audio tracks or mux the Audio in MKV with mkvmerge
http://www.videohelp.com/tools/MKVtoolnix if you wish to use other player.

Thanks for doing shit right. Good details. Good content. Selection. Convenience. I said it already thank you.
